lines.i: This section contains data defining the patient's occupational, personal (e.g. lifestyle), social, and environmental history and health risk factors, as well as administrative data such as marital status, race, ethnicity and religious affiliation. Social history can have significant influence on a patient's physical, psychological and emotional health and wellbeing so should be considered in the development of a complete record.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7936, CONF:10449 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.17"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14819)/@code="29762-2" Social history (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:14820)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:7953, CONF:7954)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:9132, CONF:9133)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.8)
